sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental) Once per game session, the character can choose to make one skill check using Intellect, rather than the characteristic linked to that skill. When he does this, he must explain how, in this particular instance, his intelligence is helping him overcome this challenge.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Stroke of Genius</name> <number>TAL0001227</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 13:05:38</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3185d0e62fbf1490e0f497eef699b64d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 13:05:38</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
